properties.name: Name of the person
properties.affiliation: Organization or group the person is associated with

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: A group of people working together for a common purpose

properties.name: Name of the organization
properties.type: Type of organization (e.g., research, government, corporate)
properties.location: Location of the organization's headquarters or main operations
properties.mission: The organization's primary goal or purpose

entity_types.name: Technology
entity_types.description: A tool, technique, or system used to solve a problem or achieve a goal

properties.name: Name of the technology
properties.description: Brief explanation of what the technology does
properties.developer: Person or organization that developed the technology
properties.purpose: The intended use of the technology
properties.status: Current state of the technology (e.g., development, deployment)

properties.name: Name of the location
properties.type: Type of location (e.g., city, building, facility)

properties.name: Name of the concept
properties.importance: Significance of the concept in the context of the story

relation_groups.name: development
relation_groups.description: Relations describing the creation and evolution of technologies and concepts

relations.name: Developed_By
relations.description: Indicates who created or developed a specific technology
relations.detail: The person was responsible for the design, creation, or significant improvement of the technology.

relations.name: Developed_At
relations.description: Indicates the organization where a technology was developed
relations.detail: The organization provided the resources, facilities, or support necessary for the technology's development.

relations.name: Based_On
relations.description: Indicates the underlying principle or idea that a technology is built upon
relations.detail: The technology's design or function is directly derived from or inspired by the concept.

relations.name: Evolved_From
relations.description: Indicates that one technology is a later version or improvement of another
relations.detail: The newer technology incorporates elements of the older technology but with significant enhancements or modifications.

relations.name: Refined_By
relations.description: Indicates who improved or perfected a technology
relations.detail: The person made significant improvements to the technology's functionality, safety, or efficiency.

relation_groups.name: usage
relation_groups.description: Relations describing how technologies are used and their effects

relations.name: Uses
relations.description: Indicates that an organization utilizes a specific technology
relations.detail: The organization employs the technology in its operations, research, or services.

relations.name: Used_By
relations.description: Indicates that a person uses a specific technology
relations.detail: The person employs the technology in their work, personal life, or research.

relations.name: Enables
relations.description: Indicates that a technology makes a concept possible or easier to achieve
relations.detail: The technology's capabilities directly contribute to the realization or advancement of the concept.

relations.name: Integrates_With
relations.description: Indicates that two technologies work together or are combined into a single system
relations.detail: The technologies are designed to function as a unified whole, enhancing each other's capabilities.

relations.name: Deployed_At
relations.description: Indicates the location where a technology is implemented or used
relations.detail: The technology is physically present and operational at the specified location.

relation_groups.name: affiliation
relation_groups.description: Relations describing the connections between people and organizations

relations.name: Works_At
relations.description: Indicates that a person is employed by or affiliated with an organization
relations.detail: The person has a formal working relationship with the organization.

relations.name: Leads
relations.description: Indicates that a person is the leader or head of an organization
relations.detail: The person has the authority to make decisions and guide the organization's direction.

relations.name: Member_Of
relations.description: Indicates that a person is a member of an organization
relations.detail: The person is part of the organization and adheres to its rules and principles.

relations.name: Founded
relations.description: Indicates that a person established or created an organization
relations.detail: The person played a key role in the organization's formation and initial development.

relations.name: Monitored_By
relations.description: Indicates that a person's activities are being observed or tracked by an organization
relations.detail: The organization is gathering information about the person's actions, communications, or whereabouts.

relation_groups.name: ethical
relation_groups.description: Relations describing the ethical implications and considerations of technologies

relations.name: Ensures
relations.description: Indicates that an organization is working to guarantee or protect a specific concept
relations.detail: The organization's actions and policies are designed to uphold the concept.

relations.name: Threatens
relations.description: Indicates that a technology poses a risk to a specific concept
relations.detail: The technology's capabilities or potential misuse could undermine the concept.

relations.name: Promotes
relations.description: Indicates that a technology helps to advance or support a specific concept
relations.detail: The technology's capabilities directly contribute to the realization or strengthening of the concept.

relations.name: Fights_Against
relations.description: Indicates that an organization is actively opposing a specific concept
relations.detail: The organization's actions and policies are designed to counteract the concept.

relations.name: Requires
relations.description: Indicates that a technology needs a specific concept to function properly or ethically
relations.detail: The technology's operation depends on the presence or adherence to the concept.

relation_groups.name: spatial
relation_groups.description: Relations describing the location and physical relationships between entities

relations.name: Located_In
relations.description: Indicates the location where an organization is based or operates
relations.detail: The organization's headquarters or main facilities are situated in the specified location.

relations.name: Operates_In
relations.description: Indicates the location where an organization conducts its activities
relations.detail: The organization's services, research, or production take place in the specified location.

relations.name: Houses
relations.description: Indicates that a location contains or is the site of an organization
relations.detail: The organization's facilities or offices are located within the specified location.

relations.name: Near
relations.description: Indicates that two locations are in close proximity to each other
relations.detail: The locations are within a short distance of each other.

relations.name: Relocated_To
relations.description: Indicates that a person moved to a specific location
relations.detail: The person changed their place of residence or work to the specified location.

relation_groups.name: conceptual
relation_groups.description: Relations describing the relationships between abstract ideas and concepts

relations.name: Represents
relations.description: Indicates that one concept symbolizes or embodies another concept
relations.detail: The first concept is a manifestation or expression of the second concept.

relations.name: Related_To
relations.description: Indicates that two concepts are connected or associated with each other
relations.detail: The concepts share common themes, characteristics, or implications.

relations.name: Contradicts
relations.description: Indicates that two concepts are in opposition or conflict with each other
relations.detail: The concepts are mutually exclusive or incompatible.

relations.name: Enhances
relations.description: Indicates that one concept improves or strengthens another concept
relations.detail: The first concept contributes to the advancement or realization of the second concept.

relations.name: Impacts
relations.description: Indicates that a technology has a significant effect on a concept
relations.detail: The technology's use or development influences the understanding or application of the concept.
